item.title: YouTube Opens Up ‘Second Chance’ Program For Creators Banned For COVID, Election Misinformation
item.description: The program would not apply to those who infringed on copyright or violated YouTube’s creator responsibility policies.

item.title: Panther Lake & Clearwater Forest Showcase Intel 18A Process For Next-Gen Chips
item.description: If 18A delivers as promised, this could be the chapter where Intel’s comeback narrative finally matches the cadence of its technology.

item.title: ‘Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7’ Will Vastly Reduce SBMM And Have Persistent Lobbies At Launch
item.description: Open matchmaking will be the default at the launch of Black Ops 7.

item.title: Microsoft’s Free Windows Offer Ends In Days: You Need To Act Right Now
item.description: If you’re still using Windows 10 on your PC and that’s how you want it to stay, then you have to act now.

item.title: Critical Role’s ‘The Mighty Nein’ First Trailer Drops At New York Comic-Con
item.description: The Mighty Nein is the new show from the creators of The Legend Of Vox Machina.
